list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a loop with a running knot, tightening as the rope or wire is pulled and typically used to hang people or trap animals.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he began to choke as the noose tightened about his throat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh bắt đầu nghẹt thở khi thòng lọng siết chặt về cổ họng anh.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was noosed and hooded, then strangled by the executioner
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy bị tản nhiệt và trùm đầu, sau đó siết cổ bởi người thực thi
